description:
Wapol attacks Nami in her weakened condition, but Monkey D. Luffy is quick to step in and even the odds.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La fin d`un règne ! La bannière de la conviction flottera à jamais
Oukoku no Shihai Owaru Toki! Shinnen no Hata wa Eien ni
When the Kingdom`s Rule Ends! The Flag of Faith Flies Forever!
จุดจบของราชาโฉด ธงแห่งความยึดมั่นจะคงอยู่ตลอดกาล
王国の支配終る時! 信念の旗は永遠に
